title: Understanding Workbook Setup
text: To open a blank workbook, you typically start by launching the spreadsheet application and selecting 'New Workbook' from the menu options.

title: Adjusting Row Height
text: To adjust the row height, you can select the rows you want to modify and drag the boundary below the row heading to the desired height.

title: Adjusting Column Width
text: To change the column width, select the columns you want to adjust and drag the boundary on the right side of the column heading to the desired width.

hintAnswer: $$CTRL+click$$ rows to select and drag them; same with column widths
title: Selecting Rows and Columns
text: What is the correct method to select multiple rows or columns at once?
choices: $$CTRL+click$$ rows to select and drag them; same with column widths
$$CTRL+click$$ rows to select and drag them; columns must be reformatted with page layout tab
$$CTRL+click$$ columns to select and drag them;rows must be reformatted with page layout tab
